summary: A streaming app to display all episodes and movies
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner image with cinematic streaming theme for homepage (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
- Placeholder movie poster for sample content (movie-poster-placeholder.dim_300x450.png)
- Placeholder TV show poster for sample content (tv-show-poster-placeholder.dim_300x450.png)

existing_features.title: Create a frontend home page that displays a grid of all available movies with their thumbnails, titles, and brief metadata
Create a frontend page that displays a grid of all TV shows with their thumbnails, titles, and episode counts
Create a frontend detail page for movies that displays full information and includes a video player
Create a frontend detail page for TV shows that displays show information and lists all episodes organized by season
Create a frontend episode player page with video playback and episode metadata
Implement a navigation system with separate sections for Movies and TV Shows
Design a cohesive streaming platform visual theme with modern, cinematic aesthetics using rich colors, elegant typography, and sophisticated layouts

new_feature_requests.summary: Display TV show episodes in the app
Create a backend data model to store movie information including title, description, thumbnail URL, video URL, duration, genre, and release year
Create a backend data model to store TV show information including show title, description, thumbnail URL, and seasons
Create a backend data model for episodes that belong to TV shows, including episode title, description, thumbnail URL, video URL, duration, season number, and episode number
Implement backend methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve movies
Implement backend methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve TV shows and their episodes
